Load Draft Picks from PFR

Source: R/load_nflverse.R
load_draft_picks.Rd

Loads every draft pick since 1980 courtesy of PFR.

load_draft_picks(seasons = TRUE)

Arguments

seasons

a numeric vector of seasons to return, default TRUE returns all available data

Value

A tibble of NFL draft picks provided by Pro Football Reference.

See also

dictionary_draft_picks for the data dictionary

https://nflreadr.nflverse.com/articles/dictionary_draft_picks.html

Examples

# \donttest{
  load_draft_picks()

#> # A tibble: 11,632 × 10
#>    season team  round  pick pfr_id   pfr_name  player_id side  category position
#>     <int> <chr> <int> <int> <chr>    <chr>     <chr>     <chr> <chr>    <chr>   
#>  1   1980 DET       1     1 SimsBi00 Billy Si… ""        O     RB       RB      
#>  2   1980 NYJ       1     2 JoneLa00 Lam Jones ""        O     WR       WR      
#>  3   1980 CIN       1     3 MunoAn00 Anthony … ""        O     OL       T       
#>  4   1980 GB        1     4 ClarBr23 Bruce Cl… ""        D     DL       DE      
#>  5   1980 BAL       1     5 DickCu00 Curtis D… ""        O     RB       RB      
#>  6   1980 LARM      1     6 GreeCu21 Curtis G… ""        D     DL       DE      
#>  7   1980 ATL       1     7 MillJu00 Junior M… ""        O     TE       TE      
#>  8   1980 NYG       1     8 HaynMa00 Mark Hay… ""        D     DB       DB      
#>  9   1980 MIN       1     9 MartDo21 Doug Mar… ""        D     DL       DE      
#> 10   1980 SEA       1    10 GreeJa01 Jacob Gr… ""        D     DL       DE      
#> # … with 11,622 more rows
# }
